name: AppSourceCop Ruleset
description: Ruleset mit mÃ¶glichst vielen aktiven Regeln

rules.justification: AppSourceCop Rule - The field identifier must be within the allowed range and outside the range allocated to per-tenant customizations. - action:Error -> action:None
AppSourceCop Rule - Logo must have a value in the manifest files. - temporary action:Error -> action:None
AppSourceCop Rule - The ID range assigned to the extension must be within the allowed range for App Source Apps. - action:Error -> action:None
AppSourceCop Rule - The 'applicationInsightsKey' property must specify the AAD instrumentation key. - action:Warning -> action:None
CodeCop Rule - The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name. - action:Info -> action:None
CodeCop Rule - You must write a tooltip in the Tooltip property for all controls of type Action and Field that exist on page objects. - action:Warning -> action:Error
CodeCop Rule - The value of the Tooltip property of Fields must be filled. - action:Warning -> action:Error
UICop Rule - Pages and reports should use the UsageCategory and ApplicationArea properties to be searchable. - action:Info -> action:None
